body_html: Our experience with the Lenovo P910 workstation with the top of the line Lenovo PSU is that even when limiting the power using the nvidia-smi command to very lowest possible value, Tensorflow will make the PSU go to shutdown state due to the power spikes. The system may last a minute, an hour, a day or anything in between, so it is not predictable at all.
